text: Tāra pichata ē'i duṭāra prathamaṭōra nirdhāraita samaẏa yētiẏā upasthita ha’la tētiẏā āmi tōmālōkara biraud'dhē yud'dhata atyanta śaktiśālī āmāra bāndāsakalaka paṭhā'ichilō, phalata tē'ōm̐lōkē gharaē gharaē praraēśa karai dhbansayajña calā'ichila. Ē'iṭō āchila ēnēkuraā pratiśrauti yiṭō kāryakara ha’balagīẏā'i āchila
